content: connected to an IBM Z with Driver 51/Version 2.16.0. The SE drivers and versions that are supported by the HMC Driver 51/Version 2.16.0 are listed in Table 10-1. Table 10-1 SE that is supported by HMC Driver 51/Version 2.16.0 Important: The ISO image server must be in the same IP subnet with the target system to load the HMC or SE ISO. IBM Z product name Machine type SE driver SE version IBM z16 A01 3931 51 2.16.0 IBM z15 T02 8562 41 2.15.0 Chapter 10. Hardware Management Console and Support Element 423 10.2.7 HMC feature codes On IBM z16, two HMCs are delivered with the HMA FC 0129. The HMC code runs on the two integrated 1U rack-mounted servers on the top of the IBM z16 A frame. Stand-alone, outside the IBM z16 HMCs (Tower or Rack Mount) can no longer be ordered. The following HMC feature codes can be carried forward from previous systems:  Tower FC 0082  Tower FC 0062  1U Rack Mount FC 0083  1U Rack Mount FC 0063 With these HMC feature codes, Driver 51/Version 2.16.0 can be
